summary: Battlemage armor remeshed and retextured from vanilla. Includes armor, sword, two custom spells, a secret room in Breezehome, and a backstory.
descriptionHtml:
Discover the story of one of Skyrim\'s Nearly forgotten heroes. Venture to Breezehome and locate the trap door to the cache of a Battlemage from times past. Includes complete armor retexture, sword, two spells, and back story. Armor can be tempered and is pre-enchanted. You\'ll find an enchanted ring as well as a book that tells the story of the original owner.

Installation: Merge the \"Data\" folder from the download with your own. NOT a replacer.

Note: This is only available for males. I may do a female version in the future if it is successful.

Inside the hidden room you\'ll find the armor set up on a mannequin and the sword on a wall plaque. 

*Spoilers*

Armor Enchantments:
Hood: Fortify Magicka 100 points. Destruction Spells cost 25% less to cast.
Armor: Resist Shock Damage 25%. Destruction Spells cost 25% less to cast.
Gauntlets: Resist Shock Damage 25%. Increase One-Handed Damage by 50%.
Boots: Resist Shock Damage 25%. Increase Carry Weight by 100 Points.
Ring: Shouts cool down 50% faster. Activates Lightning Cloak while wearing (Purely Aesthetic)
The Spells:
Arc Blast: A single bolt with a massive impact. Sends enemies flying.
Overcharge: Large devastating stream of lightning.  Causes great damage over time. Disintegrates enemies.

Version 1.1
1. I fixed the file path. I forgot a folder the first time. I sincerely apologize for that. Should work flawlessly now.
2. Moved the entrance to a spot right behind Breezehome as I don\'t want it to interfere with any of your existing Breezehome mods.

Version 1.2
1. Major changes to textures for a more subtle and natural look.
2. Remeshed the armor for a more unique appearance.
3. Created a .BSA as the files were beginning to stack up.
author: Hearton
